chapter.title: Compute focused
chapter.para: Compute-focused clouds are a specialized subset of the general purpose OpenStack cloud architecture. A compute-focused cloud specifically supports compute intensive workloads.

note.para: Compute intensive workloads may be CPU intensive, RAM intensive, or both; they are not typically storage or network intensive.

chapter.para: Compute-focused workloads may include the following use cases:

listitem.para: Big data analytics using Hadoop or other distributed data stores
Signal processing for network function virtualization (NFV)

note.para: A compute-focused OpenStack cloud does not typically use raw block storage services as it does not host applications that require persistent block storage.
